eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.util

Class NewThreadScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.util.NewThreadScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler

    public class NewThreadScheduler
extends Object
implements hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler
    A scheduler which creates separate new threads for each task. To stop a repeating schedule, throw a CancellationException.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.
